name: minimal pinterest theme
description: this is a simplistic theme that makes pinterest more Aesthetic
additional_info: please keep credit intact and consider making a donation to support me! I'll try to update this whenever pinterest updates their interface. if you want the font to look nice, paste this in the beginning of the code - @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Karla:400,700|Oswald:700');
